thread.title: Donald Trump Tweets About 'Easy D' & The Internet Had A FIELD DAY!
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Tweets About 'Easy D' & The Internet Had A FIELD DAY!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Tweets About 'Easy D' & The Internet Had A FIELD DAY!
text:
2/08/2017 4:49 PM ET | Filed under: Politik • Donald Trump • Sad Sad • Twitter • Viral: News • Peen 
Today's presidential Twitter embarrassment is brought to you by… the letter D! 
On Wednesday, Donald Trump felt the need to vent about the judicial hurdles over his travel ban , and once again proved just how culturally out of touch he is. 
Related: Trump Is Pissed Nordstrom Dropped Ivanka's Fashion Line 
He concluded a pretty run-of-the-mill Trump tweet with the very special phrase "Easy D" — and critics genuinely had no idea what he meant by that: 
Big increase in traffic into our country from certain areas, while our people are far more vulnerable, as we wait for what should be EASY D! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 8, 2017 
This winky phrase could mean a couple different things coming from the mind of Sir Tweets-A-Lot, like "easy defense" for the country or "easy decision" for the judges. 
But of course the internet had a pretty clear consensus of what "Easy D" meant, and had a field day supplying plenty of D-related responses. (Yes, a lot of Grindr jokes were made.) 
See the best reactions to President Easy D's latest dumb ass tweet! 
Look me up on Grindr "Easy D" #easyd pic.twitter.com/KqXBUfNKi1 — Beer Breath (@Beer_Breath) February 8, 2017 
SPICER: I can't do it. There's no way to make "easy D" sound presidential. 
KELLYANNE CONWAY: *smoking two cigarettes at once* Hold my beer. — Carlos Maza (@gaywonk) February 8, 2017 
can't believe POTUS is tweeting about the gay agenda: life, liberty, & the pursuit of EASY D https://t.co/1yMXX4lkQ5
